data.name: DupFinderHelp
data.value: To run this application you will have to install Command Line Tools by Jetbrains Direct download link here: https://www.jetbrains.com/resharper/download/download-thanks.html?platform=windows&code=RSCLT After you downloaded it please specify its location in appsettings.json file, which lives in the root directory of this project

data.name: HelpMessage
AskForHelp
data.value: If you would like to see list of commands, type: --help

data.name: AppsettingsHelp
data.value: appsettings.json file missing. Please make sure to create the file as specified in the README

data.name: HtmlTemplate
data.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<title>YoCode Report</title>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
<style>
body {
    margin: 0;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: auto auto auto;
    padding: 15px;
}

.accordion {
    grid-column: 1/4;
    display: grid;
    position: relative;
    grid-template-columns: 50px auto;
    background-color: #e7e7e7;
    color: #222121;
    cursor: pointer;
    height: auto;
    border: none;
    outline: none;
    transition: 0.4s;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #cccccc;
    text-align: left;
    padding: 0;
    text-align: unset;
}

.active, .accordion:hover {
    background-color: #ccc;
}

.panel {
    grid-column: 1/4;
    max-height: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: max-height 0.3s ease-out;
}

.panel-content {
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: consolas;
    background-color: #222121;
    color: #c0c0c0;
    margin: 0px;
    counter-reset: line;
}

.panel-content ul {
    list-style-type: none;
    padding: 0;
}

.green-text {
    color: #3c922b;
}

.red-text {
    color: #922b2b;
}

.accordion-title {
    grid-column: 2/2;
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 100%;
    padding: 15px 15px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 25px;
}

.fa-times-circle-o {
    grid-column: 1/1;
    background-color: #cc444444;
    color: #cc4444;
    text-align: center;
    padding-top: 40%;
    padding-bottom: 25%;
    font-size: 130%;
}


.fa-check-circle-o {
    grid-column: 1/1;
    background-color: #64cc4444;
    color: #64cc44;
    text-align: center;
    padding-top: 40%;
    padding-bottom: 25%;
    font-size: 130%;
}
        </style>
    </head>

    <body>
        {FEATURE}

        <script>
            var acc = document.getElementsByClassName("accordion");

            for (var i = 0; i < acc.length; i++) {
                acc[i].addEventListener("click", function() 
                {
                    this.classList.toggle("active");

                    var panel = this.nextElementSibling;
                    if (!this.classList.contains("active"))
                    {
                        panel.style.maxHeight = null;
                    } 
                    else 
                    {
                        panel.style.maxHeight = panel.scrollHeight + "px";
                    }
                });
            }
        </script>
    </body>
</html>
